Average geometric angles

Source: R/jamenrich-utils.R
avg_angles.Rd

Average geometric angles

Usage

avg_angles(x, w = 1, maxAngle = 360, na.rm = TRUE, ...)

See also

Other jam utility functions: ashape(), avg_colors_by_list(), bulk_cnet_adjustments(), cell_fun_bivariate(), collapse_mem_clusters(), colorRamp2D(), deconcat_df2(), display_colorRamp2D(), enrichList2geneHitList(), find_colname(), find_enrich_colnames(), get_hull_data(), get_igraph_layout(), gsubs_remove(), handle_igraph_param_list(), isColorBlank(), make_legend_bivariate(), make_point_hull(), mem_find_overlap(), order_colors(), rank_mem_clusters(), rotate_coordinates(), subgraph_jam(), summarize_node_spacing(), xyAngle()

Examples

x <- c(90, 180);
avg_angles(x);
#> [1] 135
